title: Adrestia
description: Adrestia is a collection of products which makes it easier to integrate with [Cardano](/en/terms/cardano).

props.body: Adrestia is a collection of products which makes it easier to integrate with [Cardano](/terms/cardano). It is made of several application programming interfaces (APIs), command-line interfaces (CLIs), and software development kits (SDKs). Alternatively, Adrestia may also refer to the team working on the project itself.
